name: Bouncy Bowling
description: The objective of this game is to hit the brown barrel with the bowling ball if you miss you have to restart the game, the light blue boxes allow control over the ball if it is out of the box you can't move the ball. To restart the level you have to be in full screen, but don't press the button, press F11 on your keyboard, for laptop hold then Fn button and then press F11.
